mechanics.condition: Caster chooses up to three creatures within range
mechanics.outcome: Chosen creatures become targets of Bless spell

mechanics.trigger: Target makes an attack roll OR target makes a saving throw
mechanics.condition: Bless spell is active on target AND before the spell ends
mechanics.outcome: Target rolls 1d4 and adds the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw

description_text: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.
